REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1812 reute d f BC-CHEMFIX-<CFIX>-ACQUIR 04-02 0073

TEXT.TITLE: CHEMFIX <CFIX> ACQUIRES BALANCE OF AFFILIATE
TEXT.BODY: Chemfix Technologies Inc said it acquired the remaining 50 pct of its California affiliate, VenVirotek, previously owned by a Ventura, Calif. businessman. Terms were not disclosed. VenVirotek proved the Chemfix Process could be successfully applied to convert spent drilling fluids into a reusable clay-like product that is suitable for use as landfill cover. Reuter
